headline: Assessing Boston Properties (BXP) Valuation After Earnings Miss And Cautious Analyst Downgrades
summary: Boston Properties (BXP) is back on investor radar after its latest quarter came in below estimates on funds from operations, with higher expenses and cautious analyst commentary pressuring sentiment around the office focused REIT. See our latest analysis for BXP. The latest earnings miss and cautious commentary have added to existing pressure on BXP. The stock recorded a 1-day share price decline of 5.87% and a 30-day share price decline of 10.24%. Over a longer period, the 3-year total...
